title: Common Cold
description: The common cold is a viral infection that affects the upper respiratory tract.

sections.heading: Remedies
sections.content: Rest, fluids, warm soups, and humidifiers can help ease symptoms.

sections.heading: OTC Drugs
sections.content: Over-the-counter medications like decongestants, antihistamines, and cough suppressants can provide relief.

sections.heading: Symptom Duration
